text: Vel yesta´fifillezıne la yecidune nikahan hatta yugniyehumullahu min fadlih vellezıne yebtegunel kitabe memma meleket eymanukum fe katibuhum in alimtum fıhim hayrav ve atuhum mim malillahillezı atakum ve la tukrihu fetaytikum alel bigai in eradne tehassunel li tebtegu aradal hayatid dunya ve mey yukrihhunne fe innellahe mim ba´di ikrahihinne gafurur rahıym
